t: Amazon.com Best Sellers: The most popular items on Amazon
s: Discover the best in Best Sellers. Find the top 100 most popular items in Amazon Best Sellers.

t: Amazon tops ranking of 75 most valuable global retail brands
s: The world’s most valuable retail brand, Amazon ($315.5 billion), accounts for nearly a quarter (23%) of the total brand value of the Top 75.

t: Amazon reclaims title as USA’s most valuable brand, despite losing brand value | Press Release | Brand Finance
s: March 30, 2023 - View the full Brand Finance US 500 2023 report here  · Amazon has retaken top spot as the USA’s most valuable brand despite its brand value falling 15% this year from US$350.3 billion to US$299.3 billion. Amazon was previously the world’s most valuable brand from 2018 to 2020.

t: List of most valuable brands - Wikipedia
s: 4 days ago - The following article lists the most valuable corporate brands in the world according to different estimates by Kantar Group, Interbrand, Brand Finance and Forbes. Factors that influence brand value are sales, market share, market capitalization, awareness of a brand, products, popularity, ...

t: America’s (and the World’s) Most Valuable Brand: Amazon - Retail TouchPoints
s: January 1, 2024 - U.S. companies dominated the list of the world’s most valuable brands in 2023, comprising seven of the top 10, according to data from Brand Finance and TradingPedia. The biggest of them all is Amazon, valued at just under $300 billion. Amazon shouldered past 2022 leader Apple, which lost ...

t: Amazon slips to third-most valuable brand
s: Amazon's brand value grew 3% to top $705 billion. ... Last year Amazon was the world’s most valuable brand, now it’s third on the list. Apple and Google’s exceptionally strong year-on-year growth figures enabled them to leapfrog the retail, media and cloud services giant.

t: Amazon retains crown as world’s most valuable brand
s: June 18, 2021 - Amazon has been crowned the world’s most valuable brand for the third year in a row, according to the Kantar BrandZ 2021 Top 100 ranking.

t: Amazon, Apple top ranking of world’s most valuable brands | Chain Store Age
s: December 20, 2024 - Amazon maintained its position as the most valuable brand, growing its brand value 64% to $684 billion. (See the end of the article for a list of the 10 most valuable brands.) Apple ranked second, with a brand value of $612 billion, up 74% over 2020. Tesla ranked as the fastest-growing brand ...

t: Amazon beats Apple to become the world's most valuable brand
s: Rising in brand value by an impressive 52% year-on-year to $315.5 billion, Amazon moves ahead of Apple (no.2, $309.5 billion) and Google (no.3, $309 billion) which both rose by a modest +3% and +2% respectively, to end the technology giants’ 12-year dominance.  · In the Top 10, Facebook remained at no.6 while, for the first time, Alibaba overtook Tencent and became the most valuable ...

t: Most Valuable Retail Brands Include Nike, Louis Vuitton and Amazon – Visual Merchandising and Store Design
s: June 14, 2024 - General retail: Amazon retains its position as the most valuable retail brand with brand value growth of 6%. Innovation around product accessibility, as well as pricing sensitivity to changing consumer behaviors, delivered strong performances for Lowe’s, Aldi and TJ Maxx, as well as regional ...

t: Kantar BrandZ Most Valuable Global Brands 2025
s: - Apple is the world’s most valuable brand for the third year, and the first brand to surpass a brand value of $1 trillion - Google (No.2; $753.5bn), Microsoft (No.3; $712.9bn), Amazon (No.4; $576.6bn) and McDonald’s (No.5; $221.9) complete the Top 5 - NVIDIA (No.6; $201.8bn) leaps 18 places ...

t: Most Valuable Brands in the World (2024)
s: Boasting a market cap of close to $2 trillion, Amazon currently also ranks among the top retail companies worldwide. McDonald’s is the highest-ranked non-tech brand, coming in fifth on the ranking of the most valuable brands, with a value of $221.9 billion.

t: The World’s Most Valuable Brand – Amazon Breaks $200 Billion Mark | Press Release | Brand Finance
s: September 30, 2021 - Amazon makes history as first brand in Brand Finance Global 500 ranking to exceed US$200 billion value mark and retains title of world’s most valuable brand for third consecutive year · E-commerce no longer only path to success in retail as eBay struggles and Walmart re-enters top 10

t: Amazon, Apple most valuable brands but China’s rising - Kantar survey | Reuters
s: June 21, 2021 - Amazon (AMZN.O) and Apple (AAPL.O) are the world's most valuable brands but Chinese brands are rising up the leaders list and are more valuable than Europe's top brands, according to a global ranking by Kantar’s BrandZ.

t: Amazon cements its status as the world’s most valuable brand
s: June 30, 2020 - Amazon tops BrandZ's ranking of the 100 most valuable global brands for the second year in a row, keeping Apple in second as Google slips to fourth.

t: Covid-19 Drives Amazon’s Rise Among World’s Top Brands
s: October 22, 2020 - The online retailer and other tech giants were already firmly ingrained at the top of the Interbrand ranking, but they now hold a much greater share of overall value among the companies on the list.
